nml_option.name: config_isobaric
nml_option.description: Logical for outputting model variables interpolated to isobaric levels

nml_option.name: config_tend
nml_option.description: Logical for outputting tendency budget terms for thetam, water-vapor mixing ratio, and reconstructed winds

nml_option.name: config_pv_diag
nml_option.description: Logical for calculation of potential vorticity and variables interpolated to dynamic tropopause

nml_option.name: config_pv_tend
nml_option.description: Logical for calculation of potential vorticity tendency diagnostics
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for PV tendency diagnostics calculation; .false. otherwise

nml_option.name: config_pv_isobaric
nml_option.description: Logical for interpolation of PV diagnostics onto isobaric levels

nml_option.name: config_pv_microphys
nml_option.description: Logical for calculation of specific process tendencies from Thompson microphysics
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for PV tendencies from specific mp processes; .false. otherwise

nml_option.name: config_pv_scalar
nml_option.description: Logical for treating the initial PV field as a passive scalar and transporting it throughout the simulation
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for calculating scalar PV transport; .false. otherwise
